output: html_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)

# Install Packages

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

```{r}
# Read in the data

ucsb_grad <- read_csv(here("data", "ucsb_grad_data.csv"))
```

```{r}
# Create a new graph showing the change in domestic graduate enrollment from 2008 - 2019 

ggplot(data = ucsb_grad, aes(x = year_abbr, y = domestic_enrollment)) +
  geom_col(aes(fill = ethnicity), position = "fill") # Converted the columns from actual counts to proportions
  
```
